data.title: Jobs Search
data.meta_description: Search for your perfect position — from internship to director — and keep track of the positions you’re pursuing.
data.text:
Planner

Finney County is a fast-growing community located in the heart of Southwest Kansas. We are seeking motivated applicants for a new Planner who will perform various professional and technical-level planning work supporting the County's long-range plans. Finney County is designated a Kansas Rural Opportunity Zone and offers student loan reimbursement assistance up to $15,000 over a 5-year period.

Company

Finney County

Location

Garden City, KS

Posted

2 days ago

Transportation Planner / Senior Transportation Planner

Under general supervision, the Transportation Planner/Senior Transportation Planner is responsible for work in the collection, analysis and presentation of data, and in the development and implementation of various studies and plans.

Company

Pima Association of Governments

Location

Tucson, AZ

Posted

2 days ago

Planner II (Transportation)

The Planner II’s work will include participating in the county-level and regional transportation planning process, conducting research, collecting and analyzing data, gathering input from other professionals and stakeholders, developing recommendations for review and approval, and preparing written and oral reports.

Company

City of St. Petersburg

Location

St. Petersburg, FL

Posted

2 days ago

Parks Administrator

The County of Placer, California, is seeking a highly skilled professional for the position of Parks Administrator! TO APPLY FOR THIS EXCELLENT CAREER OPPORTUNITY, please submit an application via the County’s website. To be considered for the September 12th interviews, please apply by 5:00 pm on August 27, 2024. The final filing deadline is September 9, 2024.

Company

Placer County

Location

Auburn, CA

Posted

3 days ago

Senior Planner

The Senior Planner is responsible for the daily operations of the Community Development Dept through assisting in implementing and administering development programs, policies and plans by administering applicable city, state, and federal laws that affect planning and zoning in the City; and supervises the Planner, Development Services Coordinator, and Planning Intern.

City of Oak Creek

Location

Oak Creek, WI

3 days ago

Chief Planners

FMSIB Transportation Planning Specialist 5

The Washington State Freight Mobility Strategic Investment Board (FMSIB) is a 12-member Board appointed by the Governor held accountable to create a comprehensive and coordinated state program to facilitate freight movement between and among local, national and international markets which enhances trade opportunities.

Planning and Community Services Director

Associate Planner

Do you want to live and work in the most beautiful part of the country? Just a few minutes from Grand Teton National Park and a short drive to Yellowstone?
